about_the_game:
Epochrypha calls you and your friends to hack and slash through time as you work together to unscramble it. Choose from a band of unique warriors as you play hot-potato with unstable relics, fight through fast paced combat, and restore order to the timeline.

Epocrypha features fast paced Hack and Slash combat combined with high stakes hot-potato.
Players are responsible for transporting important items through hostile environments to restore time to its natural state.
These relics are too unstable to be held for long, so players must strategically split the burden of carrying it as they navigate through enemies and obstacles to get to the boss.

1-2 Controllers are required for Local Multiplayer functionality.
